input.sentences: the whole family gathered for the birthday present .
our boy loved his stuff and couldnt wait to get his hands on the gifts .
he was amazed by everything he saw | no gift went unloved .
the beautiful cake was amazing and tasted just as great .
it was a great birthday | lets do it again next year !
output.sentences: It was  wonderful to have the family gathered for my son'ssecond birthday.
We couldn't wait to let him open the presents, full of New stuff, he loved.
One clown doll appeared to be unloved, which amazed me.
The cake was beautiful and delectable.
It was a memorable birthday party.
